data.actual_result: You can move the  server freely behind the Add menu
data.expected_result: You should either not be able to tap the + button while you hold a server, or it should cancel the drag and drop action when the menu opens
data.short_description: Can sort servers behind the Add menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Long press any server in your list - Select Sort [server] option - Tap and hold any server - Without releasing your finger, tap the blue + button
